Html:
Hello Rawr Team ! :)

I had asked this question in this forum long time ago : do you intend to translate the application in the other languages that English?
If yes, have you plan this ? Maybe for the next extension of WoW ?

If you need help for the French language, I think that I shall have the time (everything depends when you will make it) to make it for you, if you wish it. English is not ma natural language, but I think it's not serious.

Rawr is more and more known through the players of the whole world, and I think that to bring a translation would return  the application more user-friendly...

At least, thank you very much for Rawr ;)

Irhondril

Hey. We'd really like for Rawr to support more languages, and definitely plan to at some point in time. That point just isn't here yet; we need to spend all of our time fixing Rawr up for WoW 3.0 and level 80.

Hi Astrylian

Thx for your answer. When this point will occur, I think I shall be here to help you if needed.
And you are right, concentrate you on the evolution of Rawr for the level 80 ;)

Bye !
Irhon
